_comment: This API was made by Kaxarah! All data sourced from mygamatoto.com!
_notice: These are all scaled to 100%, the enemy average.

enemies.name: Doge
enemies.description: A Loving Shiba and Battle Cat's rival. Trying to enter college this year. Very thoughtful and sends birthday gifts to Cat every year.

enemies.name: Snache
enemies.description: Uses watercolours for body paint. So… naturally weak against water. This information has nothing to do with the game content whatsoever.

enemies.name: Those Guys
enemies.description: A bunch of wusses who like to gang up. Found each other on the internet. Suprisingly, all of them are quite rich.

enemies.name: Hippoe
enemies.description: This dangerous hippo has confidence in its stamina and power. (s)he? has a multi attack skill. We don't know if it is a he or she.

enemies.name: Pigge
enemies.description: Loves going to the tanning salon, that's why her skin is red. Born in an organic free range farm. Did you know that pigs like to clean?

enemies.name: Jackie Peng
enemies.description: Loves watching Kung Fu movies, and aiming to get into Hollywood. Uses self-taught Kung Fu.

enemies.name: Gory
enemies.description: Managed to get kicked out of the zoo because of his scary face. Has no job or education, so turned to alcohol and gambling.

enemies.name: Baa Baa
enemies.description: Corny name. Corny looks. Has a complex about being too ordinary. Trying to fix this by taking comedy lessons at acting school.

enemies.name: Sir Seal
enemies.description: Came to the big city from the quiet seaside. Wanted more attention so dyed his body red.

enemies.name: Le'boin
enemies.description: Has ridiculously long reach. Likes his women curvy. Very curvy. Collects lots of magazines … don't ask what type.

enemies.name: Kang Roo
enemies.description: Always dreamed to be a boxer. Couldn't really get there because it is… well, a kangaroo. Sad, sad truth.

enemies.name: One Horn
enemies.description: Loves to help people. Works part time at a fire station. However, as he is so slow on his feet, he never makes it to the fire on time.

enemies.name: Teacher Bear
enemies.description: A kindergarten teacher. He LOVES children. His sharp claws are not suited for the job. Not related to a certain other bear. No one knows his real name.

enemies.name: Croco
enemies.description: He was saved by Dundee. Infatuated with correspondence learning. Managed to obtain several qualifications. Word Processing Cert. 2nd class.

enemies.name: B.B. Bunny
enemies.description: Quit a major company and is managing 4 companies now. Aspires to become city mayor someday.

enemies.name: Squire Rel
enemies.description: She speaks an old English dialect (?) No, seriously, it sounds like English, but it's too hard understand what she says. Works at the English school near the station.
